attributes.action: Allow Older People be safer on London Busses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can TFL ensure that the drivers of London buses are trained about falls in older people and that it could lead to fatality. Can the drivers be human a a little patient so to allow Older People to get on and off safely. How much does this take?

rejection.details: This is a matter for TfL, who fall within the remit of the Mayor of London, and not central Government
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
